about_the_game:
We are game developers from Brazil
Hello everyone, we are creating an immersive game set in the time of the Black Death.

The player will have to solve puzzles, run from enemies, destroy parts of the scenario to progress in the game. The main thing in the game is to try to generate new emotions and make the Player immersed in this medieval environment and with a dangerous disease spreading.
The game tries to show what a supposed onset of the disease would be like in a gamified way, placing it as supernatural facts.

Death or objects related to it are just information without eschatology.

The content already created is related to the onset of the disease.

The character's personal goal is to try to find a cure for his child who will get sick in the game.

The protagonist needs to get the cure so that this disease stops and does not spread further.
detailed_description:
Steam Greenlight

Hi guys, we need your help, we are putting the game up for visibility, and the more you can spread, the more support we will have, we are a small development group and for everything to work out, we need your support.


About the Game

We are game developers from Brazil Hello everyone, we are creating an immersive game set in the time of the Black Death. The player will have to solve puzzles, run from enemies, destroy parts of the scenario to progress in the game. The main thing in the game is to try to generate new emotions and make the Player immersed in this medieval environment and with a dangerous disease spreading. The game tries to show what a supposed onset of the disease would be like in a gamified way, placing it as supernatural facts. Death or objects related to it are just information without eschatology. The content already created is related to the onset of the disease. The character's personal goal is to try to find a cure for his child who will get sick in the game. The protagonist needs to get the cure so that this disease stops and does not spread further.
